entities.name: madam pince
entities.description: Madam Pince is the librarian of Hogwarts. She is mentioned as someone to hand a book back in to.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is one of Harry's best friends and a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being hesitant about breaking rules.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main protagonist and a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as asking how long it will take to make something.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is one of Harry's best friends and a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as opening the book again and checking that the coast is clear.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is known for being mean to Muggle-borns. He is mentioned as someone Ron is worried about attacking half of the Muggle-borns in the school by the time they finish making something.

entities.name: fluxweed
entities.description: Fluxweed is a plant that has to be picked at the full moon. It is mentioned as one of the ingredients needed for something.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are supporting each other in their plan to make something, as evidenced by Ron's comment 'But it's the best plan we've got, so full steam ahead, I say.'
